title: Police accuse woman of fatally shooting toddler in Killeen
content:
A woman who Killeen police say fatally shot a 2-year-old boy during an argument in on Saturday has been arrested and faces a charge of murder.
Police said Shayla Cyriece Dearinge, 26, was arguing with her aunt, the child's mother, around 2:28 p.m. on Saturday.
Killeen police spokeswoman Carroll Smith said the mother was trying to walk away from the argument when Dearinge fired a gun in her direction.
The bullet hit the child, who was rushed by family members to an area hospital where he was pronounced dead just before 5 p.m.
Dearinge was arraigned on Monday morning and is waiting to be moved to the Bell County Jail. Her bail has been set at $1 million.
